EmailTemplate.subject: Your ExxonMobil Fleet National account has been approved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your ExxonMobil Fleet National card account has been approved.
As the next step, please take a few moments to complete the attached form, following the steps below:
Recommended Program Setup:
Drivers IDs (or PIN #s) are linked to employees/drivers Fuel Cards are linked to vehicles Any driver can use his/her Driver ID number on any card on your account
Information needed on the Fleet Card Information Form:
Please choose ONE field that you would like to have appear on the second line of your card, beneath your company name
o Vehicle description or
o License plate number or
o Unit number
Leave the rest of the fields on the bottom portion of the form blank
Driver Information:
Please provide a list of your driver names along with a separate four- or six-digit Driver ID number for each driver. If you prefer for us to assign the Driver ID number, just leave that section blank.
Please fax this form back to me at {!User.Fax} at your earliest convenience. Once I receive this information I will be in touch to review the account set up with you before issuing your cards.
Need help filling out the form? Call me with any questions.
Sincerely, {!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Title} Phone - {!User.Phone} Fax - {!User.Fax} {!User.Email}
